title.rendered: “IDF Neutralizes Threat: Destruction of Missile Launcher Near Rafah – Evidence of Hamas Using Civilians as Shields”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

The IDF has destroyed the launcher that fired at the center of the country.

Earlier today, eight launchings were carried out from the area of Rafah towards the territory of the country. A short time after identifying the source of the fire, air force fighter jets in cooperation with the 162nd Division attacked and destroyed the launcher, which is located near two mosques.
This is another proof that the terrorist organization Hamas places its assets near facilities and civilian infrastructures, using the population of the Strip as a human shield.

Attached is footage from the attack: https://bit.ly/3wHM878

Attached is an infographic on the subject: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC26052024684456454
